import React, { FC } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { orderAdd } from '../../../store/orderSlice' import { foodType } from '../../../types' import ButtonOrder from './ButtonOrder' interface ItemProps { product: foodType } const ItemProduct: FC = ({ product }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleProductAdd = (event: React.FormEvent, product: foodType) => { event.preventDefault() dispatch(orderAdd(product)) } return (

{product.food_name}

{product.food_price}

) } export default ItemProduct
